  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MapTile(TileType type, int xPos, int yPos)
    Constructor of the map tile class that takes the type of the tile, sets pref size of the tile to 48*48 and initializes the tile with the given parameters and draws it and sets the on click event of the tile to the move, attack or build method of the tile depending on the state of the map grid and the state of the tile

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    attack()
    Attack the tile if the tile is attackable and draw the tile
    private void
    build()
    Build the building on the tile if the tile is buildable and draw the tile
    void
    draw()
    Draw the tile that player has revealed and set the background of the tile to the background image of the tile else set the background of the tile to the background image of the fog of war (LIGHTGREY)
    private void
    drawBorder(Unit unit)
    Draw the border of the tile if the tile is selected: yellow, if the tile is movable: green, if the tile is attackable: red if the tile is buildable: orange else set the border of the tile to null
    static MapGrid
    getGrid()
    Return the map grid of the map tile

  • Constructor Details

    • MapTile

      public MapTile(TileType type, int xPos, int yPos)
      Constructor of the map tile class that takes the type of the tile, sets pref size of the tile to 48*48 and initializes the tile with the given parameters and draws it and sets the on click event of the tile to the move, attack or build method of the tile depending on the state of the map grid and the state of the tile

    • select

      public void select()
      Select the tile and draw it and set the selected unit, city and tile to the map grid and enable all buttons of the control grid and activate the unit and city buttons of the control grid and update the info of the control grid

      Unselect the tile and draw it

      public void draw()
      Draw the tile that player has revealed and set the background of the tile to the background image of the tile else set the background of the tile to the background image of the fog of war (LIGHTGREY)
